description:
It`s all over TV; the German company Zweig is coming to Japan to face off against Mishima`s strongest robot, Sangoku Bross. But Nuku Nuku`s uneasy for some reason. Zweig`s robot takes the announcer hostage, and Sangoku Bross refuses to risk harming her... luckily, Nuku Nuku is in the audience!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The End of a Chance Meeting
